mapper.select: select su.id, su.username, su.mobile, su.nickname, su.avatar, su.create_at, fde.car_long, fde.car_model from sy_user su left join fo_driver_extension fde on su.id = fde.user_id left join fo_order fo on su.id = fo.driver_id where fo.user_id = #{userId} group by su.id
